childNodes.textContent: Discover what Calgary’s premier Electricians have to offer …
We’ve heard you Calgary. 24/7 Electric™ has been listening to the needs of Calgarian’s for over 10 years.
Trades offering home service and failing to keep their promises have left a black mark on the trades industry.
Not all service trade professionals are created equal. The 24/7 Electric Advantage® solves many of the pains homeowners have when hiring an electrician.

Offering homeowners scheduled appointment times, transparent pricing, certified trained electricians, and simply answering the phone, we are working to change what you can expect when you hire our service trade professionals.

We believe that trust is earned, integrity gained and accountability needs to be proven. From your first phone call our team works hard to gain your trust, build integrity and show we are accountable.

childNodes.textContent: Panel Upgrade - Forest Lawn Calgary NE

Electrical panels are like every other part of the house. They wear out over time, and at some point, they'll need replacing. Here's how we changed out a panel to provide stable power to this home in NE Calgary

attributes.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_cta_1 et_hover_enabled et_clickable et_pb_promo  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_no_bg

childNodes.textContent: Older homes were not built with function in mind. Often bedrooms and living rooms were missing overhead lighting. Getting power to the center of the room, with a finished ceiling is not an easy task. Here is how we were able to make these homeowners' renovation dream come true.

attributes.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_cta_2 et_hover_enabled et_clickable et_pb_promo  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_no_bg

childNodes.textContent: Outdoor Lighting Upgrade - Bridgeland Calgary SW

With so many exciting advancements in outdoor lighting, it has never been easier to add a lighted touch to the exterior of your home. Just look at how these pot lights enhance this beautiful architectural detail!
We’ve Been Serving Calgary For Over 10 Years
We have been providing expert residential electrical service, repair, and installations for over 10 years. We take pride in offering honesty, integrity, and transparency to all of the homes we serve!

childNodes.textContent: The average home has $15,000-$25,000 in appliances, security, and electronics. Maintaining your electrical system reduces downtime and saves money.

attributes.class: et_pb_with_border et_pb_module et_pb_cta_6 et_hover_enabled et_clickable et_pb_promo  et_pb_text_align_left et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_no_bg

childNodes.textContent: Making upgrades to the components of your electrical system is inevitable. Take advantage of the latest and greatest without sacrificing.
The 24/7 Electric Team™ prides itself on educating our customers. In our education and how-to series, you can find all you need and more to keep the heart of your home running smoothly.

attributes.class: et_pb_toggle et_pb_module et_pb_accordion_item et_pb_accordion_item_0 et_clickable  et_pb_toggle_open

childNodes.textContent: When is it time to change your Electrical Panel?

It's a question that no one likes to ask, but we all think about it from time to time. Is it time for me to replace my electrical panel? No one knows the answer better than a certified electrician! There are a few signs that might indicate your electrical panel is on its last leg and needs replaced.

attributes.class: et_pb_toggle et_pb_module et_pb_accordion_item et_pb_accordion_item_1 et_clickable  et_pb_toggle_close

childNodes.textContent: We often get calls from customers asking why their lights are flickering. This can be normal because of inclement weather or can be caused by a breakdown in your electrical system.
Why have I lost power in part of my home?
Common power loss issues come from tripped breakers, short circuits, overloaded circuits, or tripped GFCI circuits.
Why do I need an electrician?

childNodes.textContent: I’m pleased to hire 24/7 Electric for my house’s electrical splice repair job. Brad is an efficient professionnel who knows his job very well. He and his assistant Stacy both are very very helpful. Both of them guide me through and always available when I needed them. I will recommend 24/7 Electric to my friends and family for sure! Thank you ? guys, may Almighty bless you.
